extDescription.message: LinkShield helps you recognize dangerous websites. Never share sensitive information with unknown sites.

alertMessage.message: This website contains a link to:

severityMediumRisk.message: Medium risk: this link may be unsafe. Be careful.

adviceCheckUrl.message: Only open this link if you're sure it's safe. Check the web address carefully. Never log in if you're unsure about the URL.

noHttps.message: This link doesn't use HTTPS (high risk). Your data can be more easily stolen.

ipAsDomain.message: This website uses an IP address instead of a name (high risk). This may be a trick to mislead you.

tooManySubdomains.message: This web address contains many parts (high risk). The site may be fake.

suspiciousKeywords.message: Suspicious words found (medium risk). These are often used in scams.

suspiciousPattern.message: The web address looks suspicious (high risk). This may be used to scam you.

shortenedUrl.message: This is a shortened link (high risk). You can't see where it really leads.

downloadPage.message: This page offers a suspicious download (high risk). It may contain harmful software.

freeHosting.message: This website uses free hosting (high risk). These sites often have less protection.

encodedCharacters.message: This web address contains strange characters (high risk). This may be used to hide something dangerous.

homoglyphAttack.message: This address uses similar-looking characters (medium risk). It may try to look like a real website.

metaRedirect.message: This website automatically redirects you (high risk). You may be sent to a dangerous site.

cryptoPhishing.message: This address looks like a crypto scam (high risk). Be careful not to lose money.

externalScripts.message: This site loads suspicious external code (high risk). It may be dangerous.

suspiciousIframes.message: This site contains suspicious embedded windows (high risk). These may be used to trick you.

suspiciousParams.message: This address contains suspicious extra information (medium risk). It could be used to bypass security.

mixedContent.message: This page uses both secure and insecure parts (medium risk). It may weaken the page's security.

unusualPort.message: This site uses an unusual port (high risk). It may try to bypass security measures.

javascriptScheme.message: This address uses JavaScript (high risk). It may run harmful code.

urlFragmentTrick.message: This address contains a suspicious fragment (medium risk). It may mislead you about your real location.

suspiciousTLD.message: This domain uses a risky extension (high risk). Some extensions are often used for fraud.

base64OrHex.message: This address contains encoded information (medium risk). It may hide something dangerous.

iframeHidden.message: This site uses a hidden window (medium risk). This may hide something from you.

similarToLegitimateDomain.message: This site looks very similar to a well-known trusted site. It may be a fake copy.

popupSubtitle.message: Stay safe with warnings and protection.

backgroundAnalysisDescription.message: Block dangerous websites before you visit them.

activationRequired.message: Please enable this feature before using it.

integratedProtection.message: Built-in protection against phishing and malware

integratedProtectionDescription.message: This feature checks websites and links instantly.

premiumFeaturesActive.message: You're now using the premium version!

upgradePrompt.message: Upgrade to premium to unlock extra features.

bulkUrlCheckDescription.message: Upload a .txt file to check many links at once.

fileCheckNoUrls.message: The file does not contain any links.

allowedProtocol.message: This link uses a secure protocol.

insecureLoginPage.message: This login page doesn't use HTTPS (high risk). Your data could be stolen.

invalidUrl.message: This web address is invalid or mistyped.

loadingMessage.message: One moment, the system is checking...

loginPageNoMX.message: A login page was found, but the domain has no email server. This could be a phishing attempt.

sslValidationFailed.message: This website's security is not valid. The certificate is missing or unsafe.
